message: I propose dividing the $10000 with a 75/25 split in favor of Alice. This offers a fair balance considering the decreasing value of money over time.
I'm not convinced by your first offer. I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I think this is a fairer split given the current value of money.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 60/40 split in favor of Alice. This maintains a reasonable balance while acknowledging the diminishing value of money over time.
I'm not willing to give you the majority of the share. I think 60/40 is too skewed in your favor, considering the value of money is decreasing.
Given the continuous decrease in the value of money due to inflation, I propose an equal split of $5000 each. This ensures fairness in light of the current economic conditions.
